text: Traffic is a 2000 American crime drama movie. It contains three stories of the illegal drug trade, one in Mexico, one in San Diego, one in Ohio. Catherine Zeta-Jones plays Helena. Erika Christensen plays Caroline. Dennis Quaid plays Arnie. Traffic got very positive reviews from movie critics. The movie got back over $207 million at the box office. It also earned four Academy Awards, including Best Director and Best Film Editing. ==Other websites== * * * * * Category:2000 crime drama movies Category:American crime drama movies Category:2000s English-language movies Category:Movies set in Mexico Category:Movies set in Ohio Category:Movies set in San Diego Category:Movies about the illegal drug trade
title: Traffic (movie)
